function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Minimized philanthropic contributions","Impact":"Weak brand image and social responsibility","Mitigation":"Increase philanthropic efforts and focus on community initiatives","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Corporate stakeholders, customers, and the community","Owner":"Corporate leadership and CSR teams"},{"Description":"Low margins and financial constraints","Impact":"Limited investment in CSR initiatives","Mitigation":"Explore cost-effective CSR strategies and opportunities during crises","Technologies":"Cost-effective technologies for community development and engagement","People":"Corporate leadership, CSR teams, and industry stakeholders","Owner":"Corporate leadership and industry stakeholders"},{"Description":"Underutilized spare capacity during COVID-19","Impact":"Missed opportunity to strengthen CSR image at low cost","Mitigation":"Leverage spare capacity for impactful community initiatives and branding","Technologies":"Utilization of digital platforms and communication tools for community engagement","People":"Corporate leadership, CSR teams, and community members","Owner":"Corporate leadership and CSR teams"}]}
